mission:
Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu with slicked-back hair bursts from Tel Aviv skyline. 
    'I am the GUARDIAN of Israel!' SNAP! Hamas tunnels vanish in comic smoke. 
    Security barrier with exploding panels. KA-POW! Speaking at UN with energy effects. 
    Building high-tech nation. Political comebacks. 'Bibi will return!' Israeli flag waves.

script_processing.original_script: A Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu, slicked-back hair, bursts from Tel Aviv. He declares, 'I am the GUARDIAN of Israel!' SNAP! Hamas tunnels vanish in comic smoke. The security barrier erupts, KA-POW! Speaking at the UN, energy effects surge. Building a high-tech nation, political comebacks ignite. 'Bibi will return!' The Israeli flag proudly waves.
script_processing.final_script: A Marvel Comics explosion erupts from Tel Aviv! Benjamin Netanyahu, hair slicked back, bursts forth. He declares, "I am the GUARDIAN of Israel!" Hamas tunnels vanish in a cloud of comic smoke. KA-POW! The security barrier explodes. At the UN, energy effects surge around him as he speaks. Building a high-tech nation, political comebacks ignite with renewed vigor. 'Bibi will return!' he proclaims, the Israeli flag waving proudly behind him. The crowd roars its approval. His powerful speech resonates across the globe. A new era dawns for Israel. Hope flickers in the eyes of his supporters. Netanyahu's determined gaze speaks volumes. The future is uncertain, yet he stands resolute
